Articles.Content: I find it annoying that I pause KSP specifically for the purpose of temporarily stopping all things in the KSP software. But I still hear the music which is sometimes the main thing I want to get away from when I pause KSP, so I can hear something.
Why don't you just turn the music volume down in options? I love the KSP music, especially when I'm in space!!
It would be nice if KSP muted music automatically when it is not the active application (minimized or there are other windows on top of it).

I agree, at least as an option.

Why don't you just turn the music volume down in options? I love the KSP music, especially when I'm in space!!

You may be misunderstanding the original request.
